tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE expenses (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    department VARCHAR(50),
    description TEXT,
    amount DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE departments (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    location VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE budgets (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    department_id INT,
    total_budget DECIMAL(15, 2),
    allocated_budget DECIMAL(15, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    budget_id INT,
    expense_id INT,
    transaction_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE government_agencies (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  agency_name VARCHAR(255),
  agency_type VARCHAR(100),
  expenditure INT
)

CREATE TABLE budget_categories (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  category_name VARCHAR(255),
  category_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE budget_allocations (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  agency_id INT,
  category_id INT,
  amount_allocated INT
)

CREATE TABLE expenditures (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  category_id INT,
  expenditure_amount INT,
  expenditure_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE expenditure_approval (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  expenditure_id INT,
  approved_by VARCHAR(255),
  approval_date DATE
)
